description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.2M
  in 2019-2020 on contracts with J N A Leblanc Electrique. The average
  contract duration was 2.55 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $5.6M. The longest
  contract was 2.55 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $5.6M.
lookup_name: 'J N A LEBLANC ELECTRIQUE'

s431_number_of_contracts: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '100%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '19%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '4'

s424_mean_duration: '2.55'
s421_mean_contract_value: '5.6M'
s425_max_duration: '2.55'
s422_max_contract_value: '5.6M'
